about_the_game:
“Touhou Suijin Kairou” is a Touhou derivative RPG featuring over 150 fantasy girls!
Explore the corridors and solve the strange situation in Gensokyo!
A profound story unfolds, and your choices will change the future!

Note

We translate sentences in the game, store description using "Google Translate".
Interface and character names are translated into English, but conversational sentences remain in Japanese.
In addition, part of the picture of the character appearing in this game has a lot of skin exposure.
Characters are not totally taken off, but the ratings are assumed to be over 12 years old.

◆Story◆

One rainy day, Gensokyo was covered in a verdant corridor.
It was a fantasy labyrinth created by the overgrowth of trees and flowers, or the carelessly overlapping of terrain.

In order to restore paradise, there were girls who challenged the corridor.
Some monsters took this as an opportunity and attacked people in the corridors.

A certain god calls back from a training trip a human man who once saved Gensokyo.
Then the rain stopped and you returned to your fantasy.

◆Game explanation◆

■Character
Almost all of the more than 150 Touhou characters from the original work to Rainbow Cave will become friends.
Not only male characters such as Rinnosuke who did not join your party in the previous work, Touhou Genmu Kairoku, but also you, the main character, can be included in your party as one of the characters.
There are many ways to meet people, such as becoming friends through the story, or becoming friends after fighting together in the corridors.

■A mysterious flower
Some fantasy girls can become ``mysterious flowers'' if they meet certain conditions.
In this form, the girls' stats will greatly increase, their skills will be added, and, above all else, they will become voluptuous. It becomes huge or explosively big, and it becomes boing boing.

■Story
In the story, you will be forced to make choices in multiple scenes, which will change the immediate aftermath and the likeability of the characters you will join.
And depending on your choices, the outcome of the anomaly will change.
Will you choose to solve the strange situation in Gensokyo, save the world, or fall into darkness?
Which girl (virgin) will you choose to walk with?

In addition, the story is connected to the previous works "Touhou Magic Circle Continuous Strike" and "Touhou Genmu Kairoku."
However, the story is enjoyable even if you have not played the Touhou original or the previous work and are starting with this work.

■Exploration
You can control the main character and explore the map.
The shape of the map changes constantly, like a mysterious dungeon.
On the map, there are tools such as materials and money, light sources that light up when you get close to them, devices that activate, and magic circles that allow you to advance to the next floor or boss battle.
You are not the only one wandering around the map; when you come into contact with a fairy, a battle begins, and when you meet a fantasy girl, events such as tool trading and battles begin.

■Battle
Form a party of 5 people and fight against enemies.
Battles are command battles in which you use "techniques" to attack your opponent or assist your allies.
You win if your opponent is wiped out, and you lose if your allies are wiped out.
If you win, you can get experience points and tools, and if you lose, there is no penalty.

■Techniques
This is a technique used in battle.
There are a wide variety of effects, including techniques to attack the opponent, techniques to heal allies, techniques to change ability values, and techniques to revive a fully injured ally.
Each character has completely different skills, and it seems that if certain conditions are met, you will be able to use the skills of other characters.

■Likeability
Your favorability will increase by winning battles and giving gifts. As your favorability increases, your status will increase and you will be able to imprint powerful marks.
Please note that favorability will not decrease.

■Gifts and spirit
You can give a gift to the fantasy girl. Giving gifts will increase your spirit and favorability.
By consuming energy, you can increase your level and favorability.

■Temperament
Temperament (weather) may change due to rain or snow.
Depending on the weather, exploring the corridors and fighting may become easier or more difficult.

■Light and darkness
The light and darkness may change as the sun sets.
Enemies are more likely to be encountered at dusk.
Exploring the corridors will be difficult if the surroundings are shrouded in darkness.
In Gensokyo, it seems that there is not only darkness, but also light and darkness surrounded by true darkness...

■Noh mask
In the story, a divine spirit in the shape of a Noh mask appears.
There are various Noh masks that will help you, trap you in the dream world, give you power as equipment, try to lead you to the light, and try to lead you into darkness.
It seems that these Noh masks have a deep connection with the fantasy girl, and are closely related to this incident...

◆Replay elements◆

Score attacks are possible in some cases.
Make your enemies as strong as possible and aim for a high score.

There are also many leaderboards and 100 achievements.

◆Materials used◆

In creating this game, we borrowed many images and music materials.
I would like to take this opportunity to thank you.
The name of the author of the source material is listed in the "Credit" section on the title screen of the game.

◆External link◆

Twitter
Official Twitter:
Official Twitter (for all ages):
Hashtag: #東方翠神廻廊 #すいじん #thsuijin

Discord

◆Disclaimer◆

・This game is a derivative work of Touhou Project.
・This game is a completely free app, and there are no paid elements or advertisements.
- Game specifications and difficulty level may change due to updates.
- There is a save data export function, but we do not take any responsibility if the export fails.
・We do not take any responsibility if you are "hit" on the mysterious flower.
・We do not take any responsibility if you encounter a spiritual disorder.
・There is no R18 element. (Tatemae)

■Ecchi element
There are gal game (R12) elements such as favorability and gifts, but there are no ero game (R18) elements.
There is a scene where the fantasy girls suddenly start playing "danmaku", but since this is Gensokyo, it can't be helped, and "playing bullet hell" is not a metaphor or allusion.
Since it's all about older sisters, it's a gentle piece for gentlemen.
(If it's just the appearance) Loli girls also appear.
There is a scene where Tei supplements the confusing expressions in the story, but everything she says is true and there is not a single lie... that's what Tei said.

content_descriptors.notes:
As you progress through the game's story, characters will become friends, and some characters will be able to transform into big-breasted ladies.
Although they are not completely naked, some characters do show a lot of skin.
This game also has a strong focus on earthly desires.
There are also some misleading sentences that arouse sexual desires.
I'm assuming about R12.

name: 東方翠神廻廊 〜 Faith in the Goddess of Suwa.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
